Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
???: Meant to say this
Button caption for viewing all of the completed Repeatable Research
Research this tech to reveal its effects
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Arc weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Arc weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Firearms weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Firearms weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Explosive weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Explosive weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Psionic weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Psionic weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Biochemical weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Biochemical weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Entropy weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Entropy weapon attacks.
A major breakthrough from our weapons division has led to a boost to all of our armies' Laser weaponry!
{damageBonus}% extra damage to all Laser weapon attacks.
This amount is used for various of the techs below, they all refer to the amount of resistance you get to the respective damage channel which is told by an icon inside the {}
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Biochemical attacks.
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Arc attacks.
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Entropy attacks.
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Thermal attacks.
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Kinetic attacks.
Our scientists have made major strides in treating materials to resist Psionic attacks.
A breakthrough has occurred in the field of Armor for Mechanical Units!
All Mechanical units you control gain +{ArmorGain}[armor/].
A breakthrough has occurred in the field of Shields for Cyborg and Mechanical units!
Shields and Armor are defensive stats in the game.
All Cyborg and Mechanical units you control gain +{ShieldGain}[shield/].
A breakthrough has occurred in the field of Armor for Biological and Cyborg units!
All Biological and Cyborg units you control gain +{ArmorGain}[armor/].
A breakthrough has occurred in the field of Shields for Biological units!
All Biological units you control gain +{ShieldGain}[shield/].
Crystalloid as in made from / based on crystals
Quartzite Magma Worm is an ingame unit.
Accidental Breakthrough! During our research we discovered how to control Magma Worms and how to graft their armor onto unusual units!
Allows the production of Quartzite Magma Worms in our colonies.
All Animal, Ethereal, Mineral and Plant units you control gain +{Armor}[Armor/].
Accidental Breakthrough! During our research we discovered how to control Crystal Worms and how to project shield fields using their strange electromagnetic fields onto unusual units!
Allows the production of Quartzite Crystal Worms in our colonies.
Quartzite Crystal Worm is an ingame unit.
All Animal, Ethereal, Mineral and Plant units you control gain +{Shield}[Shield/].
Accidental Breakthrough! During our research we discovered how to contact Extradimensional Penguins from the Void and how to use our technology to improve them!
Allows the production of Penguins in our colonies.
All Penguin units you control deal +{damage}% damage, gain +{Armor}[Armor/], +{Shield}[Shield/] and +{Health}[hp/].
Accidental Breakthrough! We saw into the stars and became enlightened! We can now easily teach our units the way of all things.
Enlightened is a Celestian Secret Tech term
Accidental Breakthrough! We discovered a electron wave integration method that can combine with any form of attack, granting it Arc damage!
All units you control gain {ArcDamage}[damageWave/] on their attacks.
Accidental Breakthrough! By further agitating the XNA of the xenoplague lifeforms, we can make them transform into their next phase faster!
Accidental Breakthrough! We discovered new compounds that are less Arc conductive while increasing the performance of our machines!
All Mechanical units you control gain +{Damage}% damage and +{ResistanceWave}[defenseWave/].
Accidental Breakthrough! We discovered a way to quickly stabilize Cyborg units, granting them Steadfast!
Cyborg units you control gain [abilityblue]Steadfast[/abilityblue], making them remain at 1[hp/] and invulnerable for a turn when they drop below 1[hp/], once per combat.
Once per combat, unit remains at 1[hp/] and invulnerable for a turn when they drop below 1[hp/]
Accidental Breakthrough! We discovered how to make Biological units tougher by altering their DNA!
All Biological units you control gain {Armor}[armor/] and {HP}[hp/].
Accidental Breakthrough! We made new progress on obfuscation materials and control. We can make a permanent mist around our units, obfuscating them from enemy line of sight!
All units you control gain [abilityblue]Lightly Obscured[/abilityblue], making them {Accuracy}% harder to hit.
Our scientists made great strides towards Colonist efficiency in the field of Production gain.
productionslot/ and others like it show an icon of a colonist in the designated slot.
Our scientists made great strides towards Colonist efficiency in the field of Supply gain.
Our scientists made great strides towards Colonist efficiency in the field of Energy gain.
Our scientists made great strides towards Colonist efficiency in the field of Knowledge gain.
By using Automatic Training Inceptors, units produced in your colonies are produced with higher training.
medaliron is an icon for the unit rank
We made great strides in the field of armoring our units!
We made great strides in the way we shield our units!
We made great strides in the way we build our units!
Our scientists figured a more efficient way to gain Energy!
Our scientists figured a more efficient way to gain Supply!
Our scientists figured a more efficient way to gain Production!
Our scientists figured a more efficient way to gain Knowledge!
Our social scientists made strides in the field of Organizational Bureaucracy, making space for further policies.
We created a way of extracting Cosmite from the Void!
Our scientists managed to make our Diplomats and Envoys more efficient through advanced linguistic training and manipulation skills.
Our scientists figured a way of recycling waste commonly found in rivers into food for our colonies!
Empire gains +{Amount}[Supply/] from Rivers in a colony's Domain.
Our scientists figured out how to make geothermal generators that quickly gather energy using entropy technology.
Empire gains +{Amount}[Energy/] from Lava Streams in a colony's Domain.
Our scientists figured out a new encryption method that will prevent our data from being stolen.
Our scientists figured out a faster way to break through enemy encryption.
A new discovery in logistics allows us to deploy more Tactical Operations!
A new discovery in logistics allows us to deploy more Strategic Operations!
